short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit, create, delete and view your task list - with high and low priority included

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To-Do List Application Description:

Introducing our user-friendly To-Do List application that allows you to effortlessly manage your tasks and priorities. Whether you're a busy professional, a student with assignments, or simply someone looking to stay organized, our application empowers you to create, edit, delete, and view your tasks with high and low priority settings. Here's how our To-Do List app can streamline your daily life:

1. Create Tasks:
Add new tasks quickly and easily.
Specify task names, descriptions, and due dates.
Assign high or low priority to each task, helping you focus on what matters most.

2. Edit Tasks:
Need to make changes to a task? Our app allows you to edit task details, such as names, descriptions, and due dates.
Adjust the priority of a task as its importance changes.

3. Delete Tasks:
When a task is completed or no longer needed, you can delete it from your list.
Keep your task list clutter-free and organized.

4. View Tasks:
Effortlessly browse through your tasks to see what's on your plate.
Sort tasks by priority, due date, or completion status for a clear overview. Easily filter tasks to focus on either high-priority or low-priority items, helping you stay on top of your most important responsibilities.

5. Priority Settings:
Prioritize your tasks by assigning them as high or low priority.
High-priority tasks are prominently displayed, ensuring you tackle your most urgent responsibilities first.
Low-priority tasks are there for you to manage at your convenience.
